item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: pauescarcia
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun! [instagram-feed carousel=true]

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Applique is a fully responsive Fashion blog theme that designed with style publishers in mind! We keep things simple and elegant to make sure any fashion blogger—even those without IT background, can use it. We believe that a blog theme, should feel fluid, light, and intuitive. That’s what we are aiming to make with applique, using clean code and detailed designs in each our custom features maintaining balance between design and technology. We present to you Applique our most elegant theme yet.

Add beauty right off the bat! Applique is easy to install and customize. Yup, you will just need 5 minutes for the installation and Applique’s customization via WordPress Live Customizer. By using WordPress Customizer manage all aspects of your site using a live previewer, so you can see exactly how that logo, font, or layout will look before you publish. Customization made easy! Applique giving you the power to customize your blog with various elements option to create in an effortlessly timeless style, and unlimited color options. Besides, you will get exactly the same Applique’s demo content.
Being positive is really a series of thought processes, so do happiness is really about a mindset.
Improve your blog speed performance and Google rank. To get these performances, first Applique is compatible with SEO (Search Engine Optimization). SEO will help your own blog increase your search engine visibility, drive more traffic to your blog and generate more leads and sales for your business (if you’d like to leverage your blog to grow your business). Blog is only getting better because it puts a focus on content. Although, SEO is only a part of blog, it offers great information and advice. Now, content is so crucial for blogging and SEO will be one not to miss.

Amori  Cards es un sitio web profesional de diseño especializado en la personalización de tarjetas e invitaciones. Ofrecemos los modelos según la tendencia con nueva tecnología de corte e impresión.

Contamos con:   Estudio de diseño para hacer los modelos según la tendencia y la demanda de clientes.   Una fábrica profesional de  impresión  para cubrir todas sus necesidades como estilos de caligrafía, tecnología y tonos.   Una fábrica de papel para ofrecerles todos los tipos de papeles y el servicio de corte por láser.

Sorprende a quien amas con AmoriCards

item.title: Tipo de impresión
item.dc:creator: pauescarcia
item.content:encoded:
Estampación en Oro

¿ Qué es Estampación Oro?

Una tecnología de impresión especial. Un método artesanal tradicional de impresión realizado a mano.

¿Cómo funciona?

Primero usa una pieza de metal para grabar su diseño. Luego se calienta y se presiona firmemente en la tarjeta seleccionada con una hoja de papel de color, intercalado entre los dos. Como resultado, Una tarjeta con un hermoso acabado metálico.

Colores de estampación

Muestra de las impresiones.

Termografía

¿ Qué es termografía?

Un proceso de impresión que hace el texto o gráficos para elevarse ligeramente. Un efecto visual muy formal y elegante. Termografía también es un proceso comúnmente utilizado para las invitaciones. Produce el aspecto y la sensación de una gama más alta.

Proceso de termografía

Más clase a menor costo TERMOGRAFÍA es un sistema especial de impresión, de cual podemos decir que consiste en dar un relieve a las letras impresas que simula relieve, que es más caro y más elegante. Podríamos definir los pasos básicos del proceso de impresión con termografía de la siguiente manera: Se imprime la hoja con tinta, esta sale de la imprenta con la tinta todavía fresca hacia una cinta transportadora que la lleva hacia una unidad que libera una resina sobre toda la hoja. Luego, esta pasa a través de una unidad de vacío que remueve la mayor parte del exceso de resina que no esté pegado a la tinta fresca. La hoja pasa entonces por una unidad de calentamiento que derrite la resina sobre la tinta, dándole el efecto de relieve.

Muestra de las impresiones en termografía

Impresión digital

¿Qué es la impresión digital?

La impresión digital es un proceso que consiste en la impresión directa de un archivo digital a papel, por diversos medios, siendo el más común la tinta en impresora inyección de tinta (cartuchos), y tóner en impresora láser. Este proceso es ideal para proyectos de impresión de bajo volumen y tiempos de entrega sumamente cortos, ya que una de las principales ventajas que ofrece es la disponibilidad casi inmediata de los impresos, pues no requiere tiempo de secado o enfriamiento al no trabajar con tintas, como la tradicional impresión ófset. Uno de los valores añadidos que ofrecemos en la impresión digital es la personalización del producto. Por favor espere 3 días hábiles desde que se realice su pedido para una prueba digital de acabado. La prueba se debe de leer cuidadosamente y usted debe de hacernos saber si necesita revisiones. Permitimos cambios dos veces, sin embargo, en las revisiones adicionales cobramos $7.00 cada vez. Una vez que su pedido sea aprobado vamos a proceder a realizar sus invitaciones lo que nos toma un tiempo de 2 – 4 semanas. Órdenes de estampación y termografía impresa requieren un tiempo de 3- 4 semanas a partir de la aprobación de la prueba.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Women are more sure of themselves today. They don't have to emulate the way men dress.
I have my permanent muses and my muses of the moment.
What you wear is how you present yourself to the world, especially today when human contacts go so fast. Fashion is instant language.
I'd like to believe that the women who wear my clothes are not dressing for other people, that they're wearing what they like and what suits them. It's not a status thing.
Fashion to me has become very disposable; I wanted to get back to craft, to clothes that could last.

item.dc:creator: sara
item.content:encoded:
Applique is a fully responsive Fashion blog theme that designed with style publishers in mind! We keep things simple and elegant to make sure any fashion blogger—even those without IT background, can use it. We believe that a blog theme, should feel fluid, light, and intuitive. That’s what we are aiming to make with applique, using clean code and detailed designs in each our custom features maintaining balance between design and technology. We present to you Applique our most elegant theme yet.

5 Ways Applique will help you grow your fashion blog: 1. Add beauty right off the bat Add beauty right off the bat! Applique is easy to install and customize. Yup, you will just need 5 minutes for the installation and Applique’s customization via WordPress Live Customizer. By using WordPress Customizer manage all aspects of your site using a live previewer, so you can see exactly how that logo, font, or layout will look before you publish. Customization made easy! Applique giving you the power to customize your blog with various elements option to create in an effortlessly timeless style, and unlimited color options. Besides, you will get exactly the same Applique’s demo content. 2. Improve your blog performance Improve your blog speed performance and Google rank. To get these performances, first Applique is compatible with SEO (Search Engine Optimization). SEO will help your own blog increase your search engine visibility, drive more traffic to your blog and generate more leads and sales for your business (if you’d like to leverage your blog to grow your business). Blog is only getting better because it puts a focus on content. Although, SEO is only a part of blog, it offers great information and advice. Now, content is so crucial for blogging and SEO will be one not to miss. Second, ensuring your site is Mobile-Friendly! Because Google began rolling out its “mobile-friendly” update, which makes mobile-friendliness a stronger ranking factor for mobile searches. Applique is designed to be mobile-friendly for your blog to get easy affected by Google’s mobile friendly. These days includes Mobile, it's not an option. Today should be Mobile Friendly, of course, it has to! Third, Applique is created not only with clean code, but also without bloated plugins/features. It will make a good performance for your blog site. 3. Monetize your blog If you’d like to leverage your blog to grow your business, monetize your blog! Earn money from your passion is the best avenue to start affiliate marketing. This is one of the easiest and most common ways to make money blogging. Affiliate marketing is about sell or promotes someone else’s stuff and gets paid for doing it, simple. Applique provides you the Affiliate Metabox to place in post and page of your site. To using this Affiliate Metabox, you have to create your account first in ShopStyle Affiliate Program. Because of Applique is already compatible with ShopStyle. More than just easy! Applique is also has the Multiple Advertising Space, place in header, footer, and sidebar. Most Bloggers and you can also set aside a portion of their page for marketers to buy as party of a paid advertising campaign. 4. Connect with your readers Connect with your readers! item.title: Invitación romantica flores
item.dc:creator: pauescarcia
item.content:encoded:
Descripción

Código: AMC080 Tamaño de la invitación 145 x 145 mm Diseño: Corte Láser  

Contenido

Cada paquete contiene: la invitación en el color de su preferencia, hoja interior en el color de su preferencia, texto personalizado, bolsa de celofán y sello.

Tiempo de realización

Por favor espere 3 días hábiles desde que se realice su pedido para una prueba digital de acabado. La prueba se debe de leer cuidadosamente y usted debe de hacernos saber si necesita revisiones. Permitimos cambios dos veces, sin embargo, en las revisiones adicionales cobramos $7.00 cada vez. Una vez que su pedido sea aprobado vamos a proceder a realizar sus invitaciones lo que nos toma un tiempo de 2 – 3 semanas.

Tipos de impresión

Impresión digital, termografía y estampación en oro.

Precios

Descuento especial con pedidos mayores a 100 unidades.

<!--more-->
Descripción

Diseño: Corte Láser

item.title: Acetato y Vellum: Material de tarjetas
item.dc:creator: pauescarcia
item.content:encoded:
A veces nos sentimos un poco perdidas entre tanto material para realizar tarjetas. Que tintas, sellos, spray, acuarelas, foil, polvos para embossing, cut die ...
Hoy vamos a conocer el vellum y el acetato y siempre me preguntaba y ¿ esto para que sirve?
El vellum no es otra cosa que papel vegetal y lo hay liso y estampado. Y por otro lado el acetato que es la última tendencia es un plástico transparente.
Son materiales muy simples pero sirven para dar layouts a las tarjetas.
En este ejemplo vemos como sirve de base para dar la apariencia de que esta flotando en el aire.
El vellum nos sirve para decorarlo números, letras, formas, también nos sirve para crear ramilletes, flores, globos, lo podemos estampar.
Pero se ven más geniales con rellenar 2 acetatos con lentejuelas para darles un aspecto genial.
Recuerden que estos dos materiales nos sirven de maravilla para simular vidrio de ventanas, puertas los  jarro Manson Jar e incluso los podemos rellenar con diferentes materiales como lentejuelas, diamantinas, figuras de corazones, confeti, etc.

Yup, you will just need 5 minutes for the installation and Applique’s customization via WordPress Live Customizer. By using WordPress Customizer manage all aspects of your site using a live previewer, so you can see exactly how that logo, font, or layout will look before you publish. Customization made easy! Applique giving you the power to customize your blog with various elements option to create in an effortlessly timeless style, and unlimited color options. Besides, you will get exactly the same Applique’s demo content. 2. Improve your blog performance Improve your blog speed performance and Google rank. To get these performances, first Applique is compatible with SEO (Search Engine Optimization). SEO will help your own blog increase your search engine visibility, drive more traffic to your blog and generate more leads and sales for your business (if you’d like to leverage your blog to grow your business). Blog is only getting better because it puts a focus on content. Although, SEO is only a part of blog, it offers great information and advice. Now, content is so crucial for blogging and SEO will be one not to miss. Second, ensuring your site is Mobile-Friendly! Because Google began rolling out its “mobile-friendly” update, which makes mobile-friendliness a stronger ranking factor for mobile searches. Applique is designed to be mobile-friendly for your blog to get easy affected by Google’s mobile friendly. These days includes Mobile, it's not an option. Today should be Mobile Friendly, of course, it has to! Third, Applique is created not only with clean code, but also without bloated plugins/features. It will make a good performance for your blog site. 3. Monetize your blog If you’d like to leverage your blog to grow your business, monetize your blog! Earn money from your passion is the best avenue to start affiliate marketing. This is one of the easiest and most common ways to make money blogging. Affiliate marketing is about sell or promotes someone else’s stuff and gets paid for doing it, simple. Applique provides you the Affiliate Metabox to place in post and page of your site. To using this Affiliate Metabox, you have to create your account first in ShopStyle Affiliate Program. Because of Applique is already compatible with ShopStyle. More than just easy! Applique is also has the Multiple Advertising Space, place in header, footer, and sidebar. Most Bloggers and you can also set aside a portion of their page for marketers to buy as party of a paid advertising campaign. 4. Connect with your readers Connect with your readers! Keep your reader engaged in your blog. Applique is integrated with social media share buttons to keep you easy to use, just simply copy & paste your account social URL. It will appear at your post, easy connects to your reader, if they want to share your post to their social media with one click. Beside, you can use WordPress or Disqus Comment system to communicate with them. Aim to make commenting easier and more interactive. Also Applique has full-width Instagram Feed places at the bottom of your blog (footer area). You can sort Instagram photo by ‘Newest to oldest’ or ‘Random’, it’s depend on what you want. Also you can set your number of photos and number of columns that will appear. It’s easy customizing! Another feature is Sticky Navigation, it will make your blog quicker to navigate. Of course, keeping readers able to find what they’re looking for quicker when they didn’t have to scroll back to top of the page. It can have a big impact on readers. The last is Sidebar & Social Media, it provides easy access to any section of the blog. It will make easier for reader to get specific information what they want to read. 5. Add more features to your blog Add more features to your blog without coding skills needed! Applique has 4 possibilities of different types of posts: standard, audio, video, and gallery. Once you published your posts, these will appear in full-width Featured Post Slider. This feature is support for using a representative your featured image of your posts, and the default will show your latest posts. Besides, you can create your widget area at your sidebar and front-page template. And Applique has Beautiful Archive with Advanced Search, easy to search the specific post or page that you need. It comes with the drop-down category and selects date options. For the accent border, Applique has 2 styles, light & bold. You can choose your border that you want the most!

item.title: Invitación gatefold
item.dc:creator: pauescarcia
item.content:encoded:
Descripción

Código: AMC067 Tamaño de invitación: 127 x 185 mm Tamaño de la hoja Interior: 120 x 180 mm Estilo: Corte Láser Color de la invitación: Glittering Ivory/Glittering Navy/Metallic Gold. Color de Hoja Interior: Light Kraft/Ivory.

Contenido

Cada paquete contiene: la invitación en el color de su preferencia, hoja interior en el color de su preferencia, texto personalizado, bolsa de celofán y sello.

Tiempo de realización

Por favor espere 3 días hábiles desde que se realice su pedido para una prueba digital de acabado. La prueba se debe de leer cuidadosamente y usted debe de hacernos saber si necesita revisiones. Permitimos cambios dos veces, sin embargo, en las revisiones adicionales cobramos $7.00 cada vez. Una vez que su pedido sea aprobado vamos a proceder a realizar sus invitaciones lo que nos toma un tiempo de 2 – 4 semanas.

Tipos de impresión

Impresión digital, termografía y estampación en oro.

Precios

Descuento especial con pedidos mayores a 100 unidades. Para realizar una cotización contáctenos en  Messenger .

Perfectas para Bautizo, Baby Shower, Presentación Etc.
Cada invitación se entrega ya impresa con los datos de su evento, incluye moño satinado en color a elegir y gema color cristal. La base puede ser en color blanco o crema, van dentro de sobre transparente con sello.

Color de Alas : Oro, rosa pastel, Plata, Azul cielo, Menta, Violeta, Fucsia o Blancas Color de Listón: Oro, Blanco, Rosa, Rosa pastel, Plata, Chocolate, Vino, Violeta, Azul cielo, Azul marino, Amarillo, Ivory, Fucsia, Verde o Naranja.
